The claim was published on March 22: 2020, by an Australia-based Facebook user and has been shared more than 2,000 times.
The claim states that people with pre: existing respiratory conditions in Australia can contact their GP for a "Rescue Pack" consisting of a 5-day supply of a corticosteroid (prednisolone) and a 5-day supply of an antibiotic (usually amoxicillin or doxycycline) to be used if they develop breathing issues.
The Department of Health in Australia ha: Rescue Pack" from their GP unless it has been previously prescribed.
